judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Beien, Pomeeoy and Baebieei, JJ.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order granting allocatur in the above case is hereby vacated as improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John W. Packel, Assistant Defender, with him Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.

Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, with him Bomer Holieron, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, v. Dostellio, Appellant.
Argued April 23, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Beien, Pomeeoy and Baebieei, JJ.
John W. Packel, Assistant Defender, with him Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, with him Bomer Holieron, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 28, 1971:
